overview.en: BUSD is a 1:1 USD-backed stablecoin approved by the New York State Department of Financial Services (NYDFS), issued in partnership with Paxos. BUSD is supported on both ERC-20 and BEP-2; you can transfer your dollars anywhere in minutes, with low cost and on the blockchain.You can purchase and redeem BUSD with Zero Fees.
overview.cn: BUSD是由纽约州金融服务部（NYDFS）批准，由币安与Paxos合作发行的, 以1：1美元计价的稳定币。支持ERC-20 和BEP-2，方便储存和传输，购买和赎回零手续费。
